### Referência Bibliográficas

#### Principais

- Hyndman, R.J., \& Athanasopoulos, G. (2021) Forecasting: principles and practice, 3rd edition, OTexts: Melbourne, Australia. [Link](https://otexts.com/fpp3/)
- Wei, W. (2005). Time Series Analysis: Univariate and Multivariate Methods, 2ed, Pearson

#### Complementares


- Huang, C., \& Petukhina, A. (2022). Applied Time Series Analysis and Forecasting with Python. Springer Nature. [Link](https://link.springer.com/book/10.1007/978-3-031-13584-2)
- Morettin, P.A, \& Toloi, C.M.C. (2006). Análise de Séries Temporais, 2ed, Blucher.
- Shumway, R. H., & Stoffer, D. S. (2019). Time series: a data analysis approach using R. Chapman and Hall/CRC.
